info.name: NZBFinder Darker
info.description: A dark variant on NZBFinder, mostly charcoals and blues
info.additionalInfo:
20131215
* more contrast for currently selected page link

20131025
* fix for white background in search area
* fix for alert div colors

20131018
* fix for white login area
* fix for white menus
* add some color to action buttons (d/l, add to cart, del from cart)

20131017
* first pass, there are probably bits I've missed. Be gentle: I only spent about 10 min on this.
